entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
